code:
"""

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_sort

Worst-case performance: O(N^2)

"""


def bubble_sort(arr):

    def swap(i, j):
        arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

    n = len(arr)
    swapped = True
    while swapped:
        swapped = False
        for i in range(1, n):
            if arr[i - 1] > arr[i]:
                swap(i - 1, i)
                swapped = True

array = [1, 5, 65, 23, 57, 1232, -1, -5, -2, 242, 100,
         4, 423, 2, 564, 9, 0, 10, 43, 64, 32, 1, 999]
print(array)
bubble_sort(array)
print(array)

"""

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_sort

Worst-case performance: O(N^2)

"""


def bubble_sort(arr):

    def swap(i, j):
        arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

    n = len(arr)
    swapped = True
    while swapped:
        swapped = False
        for i in range(1, n):
            if arr[i - 1] > arr[i]:
                swap(i - 1, i)
                swapped = True

         4, 423, 2, 564, 9, 0, 10, 43, 64, 32, 1, 999]
